message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I think you'll find it incredibly valuable and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.
Alice, while I appreciate your offer,  $20,000 is significantly higher than my budget.  I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product.  This is my best offer, and it's the highest I'm able to go.
Bob, I understand your position, but $20,000 is already a competitive price for this product.  To make this work, I could come down to $17,000.  This is my final offer.
